V

validateCard(Card) - Method in class com.unoapp.uno.models.Played
Validates a card to check if its playable or not Cases: 1) Played card is special (Wild / Draw 4) 2) Last played card is of color BLACK 3) Last played card matches color of current card 4) Last played card matches number of current number
